page.title: 16RECREATION IN FAIR OAK
page.content: Fair Oak residents organise a wide range of recreational activities. The recreation ground is fully used and is constantly being improved. Recently an all-weather cricket pitch has been installed. On November 5th each year a gigantic bonfire and firework display are staged in the corner of the recreation ground, and attended by people from surrounding areas. There is one village football team and also 6 football clubs for boys. The Squash Club has three courts. For five years out of seven, the club has won the championship of the Hampshire Premier League. There are also Keep Fit classes and Badminton, Judo, Karate, Tennis and Trampolining clubs for adults and for children. An Art Club and a Camera club give pleasure to members and to the public.
